name: Red-Eyes Fusion (Skill v1)
text: Can be used if your Life Points are at 2400 or below. Return 1 "Red-Eyes" card from your hand to your Deck, and add "Red-Eyes Fusion" from your Deck to your hand. If your Life Points are exactly 2400, you can return 1 "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" from your graveyard to your Deck instead. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
